articles.description: The popular soap opera "Days of Our Lives" is making the switch from NBC to Peacock. The series will still be putting out new episodes on the streaming platform.
articles.content:
"Days of Our Lives" has reached the end of an era. The soap opera has been NBC's longest-running series, but will soon find a new home on the Peacock streaming platform. 
The network announced that … [+2140 chars]
